document.full_text: ridden by jesus castanon, shackleford edged past animal kingdom, the winner of the kentucky derby, to take the 136th running of the preakness stakes.
document.title: the rail: shackleford takes 136th preakness stakes
lines_and_colors: ridden by jesus castanon, shackleford edged past animal kingdom, the winner of the kentucky derby, to take the 136th running of the preakness stakes.
